ISSUE.TITLE: Possibility to copy a monitor
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the solution you'd like** Be able to open a Monitor in dashboard, and have a boton Copy in the same row as the Edit and Delete buttons. It would copy the whole configuracion, and maybe rename it adding a " - Copy" suffix
